response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value to me, and I believe it would be equally beneficial to you. Given its importance, I am offering it to you at a special price tailored to your needs.

I propose to sell the product to you for $1,300,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between the intrinsic worth of the product and the value it holds for both of us. I am confident that this offer presents an excellent opportunity for you to secure a high-quality asset at a favorable rate.

Please let me know if you require any further information about the product or the terms of this offer. I am more than happy to provide additional details to help you make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1300000}
